description: In a surreal scene, a man is observed emerging from a dark, smoky underground tunnel via a narrow crack in the earth's surface while another person looks down the opening. Above ground, a well-dressed couple stands nearby as a woman calls out, highlighting the absurdity of the situation by juxtaposing the arrival of guests, presumably the Johnsons, with the hidden, subterranean activity. The woman's use of a common parental threat, mentioning 'the hose,' to command the person out of the ground adds an ironic domestic layer to the bizarre scenario. The panel captures the humorous conflict between social expectations and eccentric, hidden behavior.
caption: "Reuben! The Johnsons are here! You come up this instant ... or I'll get the hose!"
